DataElement.preferredName: Artificial Cardiac Valve Self-Report Personal Medical History Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Not naturally arising. Any of the four heart valves, including the two atrioventricular valves and the two semilunar valves, that regulate the flow of blood through the chambers of the heart. An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information. A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Property.preferredDefinition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation  of an event or information.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
